import React from 'react' import Slider from "react-slick" const FlashCard = ({ productItems }) => { const settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay: true, appendDots: (dots) => { return
    {dots}
}, } return ( <> {productItems.map((productItems) => { return (
{productItems.discount}% Off


{productItems.name}

{productItems.price}.000 Ä‘

) })} ) } export default FlashCard
